description: Represents a monitor, which defines the monitoring boundaries for measurements that Internet Monitor publishes information about for an application

MonitorConfigState.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PENDING | ACTIVE | INACTIVE | ERROR  
Update requires: No interruption

MonitorProcessingStatusCode.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: OK | INACTIVE | COLLECTING_DATA | INSUFFICIENT_DATA | FAULT_SERVICE | FAULT_ACCESS_CLOUDWATCH  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: The metadata that you apply to the cluster to help you categorize and organize them. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value, both of which you define.

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
The metadata that you apply to the cluster to help you categorize and organize them. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value, both of which you define.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

iso8601UTC.description: The date value in ISO 8601 format. The timezone is always UTC. (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ)
iso8601UTC.markdownDescription:
The date value in ISO 8601 format. The timezone is always UTC. (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ)

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^([0-2]\d{3})-(0[0-9]|1[0-2])-([0-2]\d|3[01])T([01]\d|2[0-4]):([0-5]\d):([0-6]\d)((\.\d{3})?)Z$  
Update requires: No interruption
